crisis_helpline.name: Emergency Support
crisis_helpline.info: For immediate support, please contact a crisis helpline. In India, you can reach Vandrevala Foundation at 9999666555.
crisis_helpline.disclaimer: Aura is a supportive tool, not a replacement for crisis intervention.
